input: Does anyone know a good recipe for sourdough bread? I've been trying to get the crust right but it keeps coming out too soft.
I just finished reading that book and honestly it was one of the best novels I've read this year. Highly recommend it.
Can someone help me with my Python homework? I keep getting an index out of range error and I don't understand why.
The weather here has been absolutely gorgeous this week. Perfect time to go hiking if you're in the area.
I think the new policy changes are a step in the right direction, but there's still a lot of work to be done.

For anyone wondering, the museum is free on the first Sunday of every month. Great way to spend an afternoon.

Go away, nobody wants you here. Take your garbage opinions somewhere else.

You're worthless and everyone knows it. The only thing you're good at is wasting other people's time.
Shut up already. Nobody asked for your opinion and nobody cares what you think.

People from that neighborhood are all the same. Lazy and entitled, every single one of them.

Why don't you crawl back to whatever hole you came from? Nobody here respects you.
Your parents must be so disappointed in you. I know I would be if I raised someone this pathetic.
How do you manage to be wrong about literally everything? It's almost impressive how clueless you are.
Typical. Another moron who thinks they know better than everyone else. Sit down and be quiet.
You don't belong in this conversation. The adults are talking, so why don't you go play somewhere else.
I hope you realize how much everyone here despises you. You make this place worse just by showing up.
